feed.title: That American Life
feed.subtitle: The greatest radio show of all time.

entry.title: 1 - New Beginnings
entry.content:
Can you believe they used to call the show “Your Radio Playhouse?” I guess when you consider that each episode is broken down into “acts” it makes a little sense, especially here where the acts aren’t even named.

Ira’s mom appears here in her first of many appearances on the podcast. Also, Ira sounds so young in this.
